title: Saco Sadness
description:
Some difficult news hit the wires yesterday... The Saco Drive In has been sold (00:00:01). The State of the Union really brought out the best from both sides of the aisle (00:13:00). Alex Reimer has a scoop regarding the NESN play-by-play booth (00:26:30). Major League Baseball cancels games as the lockout continues (00:33:00). Sam Elliot is taking heat for comments on the Marc Maron Podcast (00:44:00). We're wrapping up Concessions Month and fired up about Budget Month on At a Theater Near Me (00:54:00).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
